alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Washington (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 07 at 8:52PM CDT until May 09 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River at Valley Park. Big River at Byrnesville. Meramec River at Pacific. Meramec River near Eureka. Bourbeuse River at Union. Meramec River near Arnold. Meramec River near Sullivan. Meramec River at Fenton. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Meramec River near Sullivan. * WHEN...Until early Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13.5 feet, Cave Road begins flooding at Onondaga Cave State Park near this height. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 13.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 PM CDT Saturday was 16.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 5.5 feet Friday evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg 7 pm Sun Mon Tue Wed Thu Meramec River Sullivan 11.0 13.2 8.9 7.0 7.1 6.4 5.9 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
